summary: Driving simulation project focused on realistic, infinite highways for semi-trucks, including cities, rest stops, infrastructure, and additional player modes/cameras.
known_issues: Player is being forced back to a previous position/location instead of being allowed to continue driving

existing_features.title: Remove the forced truck reset/teleport behavior so the player can continuously drive without being snapped back to a previous location/position.
Implement an infinite (endless) highway/road system so the drivable roadway extends continuously in the direction of travel (no visible end), while keeping performance stable.
Make bridges/overpasses actually drivable by adding a drivable surface/collision/height-following so the truck can drive onto and across bridge decks (including elevated roadway sections).
Add occasional randomized 'construction ahead' road events that spawn sometimes while driving, such as warning signs, cones/barrels, lane closures, and/or barriers placed on/near the roadway.
Add random power stations/substations as roadside landmarks distributed throughout the world (more than just power lines), with placement that feels believable along the highway/road.
Add city areas as recognizable clusters (e.g., skyline blocks/building groups) that appear along the drive so the world includes cities/towns the player can drive near/through.
Add semi-truck-only rest stops (truck stops) as world locations, including visible signage indicating trucks/semi parking only and features like parking bays suitable for a semi-truck.
Add a switchable seat-view (cab/driver) camera mode that the player can toggle while driving, in addition to the existing follow/chase camera.

Add a walk mode that the player can enter/exit, with keyboard controls for walking movement (forward/back/left/right) using W/A/S/D and arrow keys, and update the on-screen controls help to reflect walk controls when active.

Add a more clearly 'semi truck' vehicle option/variant for the player (semi tractor + trailer styling), while keeping existing driving controls and the imperative truck state interface used by camera/HUD/audio.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make highways/roads more realistic, including drivable bridges
Add random road construction events (e.g., "construction ahead" sometimes)
Stop resetting/teleporting player back to prior location; allow continuous driving
Add random power stations across the world
Add a semi truck vehicle ("semi ur truck")
Add walk mode with keyboard controls (e.g., arrows/W forward, backward, left/right, etc.)

projectName: Expand driving world: infinite drivable highways/bridges, construction events, cities/rest stops, cab camera, and walk mode
